prompt: Design an image upload page with retro light theme and centered layout. Feature upload zone with pink border and light pink background, retro-style upload icon, 'Upload Your Pics' text, and supported formats (JPG, PNG max 4MB). Use pink accent color for buttons and icons, place 'Upload Pics' button below upload zone. Show selected files in list with retro-style cards, file names, sizes, and remove buttons. Use cream background with bold typography and Material Design spacing.
